description: Graduated from LPU Jalandhar, Experienced Software Engineer focusing on GenAI. Born and raised in Amritsar, Punjab. I currently live in Noida.
B.Tech in ECE from LPU, Jalandhar
Experienced Full Stack Lead Software Engineer
Made a website monitoring tool. Website -> https://sitespulse.babandeep.in

Lead Software Engineer at Axtria (Jul 2023–Present): Leading scalable web platforms using React.js, Node.js, Next.js, GraphQL, and TypeScript for 10K+ users. Built micro-frontends with Module Federation, optimized PostgreSQL performance, integrated LangFlow, LangChain, Langfuse, and OpenAI/LLM pipelines for GenAI/NLP. Developed a 'Talk to Your Database' app for interactive data queries.

Software Developer at NTT Ltd. (Oct 2020–Jul 2023): Built responsive React apps, re-architected microservices using Serverless & Azure Functions, modernized SOAP to REST APIs, and implemented Redis caching & AWS Lambda flows.

Senior Software Developer at Coforge (Jul 2019–Oct 2020): Developed React dashboards, created internal design systems with Storybook, improved CI/CD via Jenkins, and mentored engineers.

Programmer Analyst at Cognizant (Sept 2016–Jul 2019): Contributed to full-stack apps, migrated AngularJS to Angular 6, built WebSocket notification engines, and enhanced CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins & GitHub Actions.
